ceramic_coating.why_header: Why Choose Ceramic Coating for Your Vehicle?
ceramic_coating.why_text: Ceramic coating is one of the most advanced and effective solutions for protecting and enhancing the appearance of your vehicle’s paint. If you are looking for a way to maintain its original shine, protect the paint, and reduce the need for frequent cleaning, then ceramic coating is the ideal choice.
ceramic_coating.for_whom_list:
• New cars: Maintain the factory-fresh appearance.
  • Used vehicles: Upgrade and protect the paint after polishing.
  • Daily drivers or luxury cars: Reduce wear from daily use or maintain the beauty of a luxury model.
ceramic_coating.step_1_body:
The ceramic coating creates a durable layer over the paint that protects against:

  • UV radiation: Prevents fading and oxidation of the paint.
  • Chemical damage: Resistant to chemicals, acid rain, and environmental pollutants.
  • Contaminants: Shields against tough stains like bird droppings, insects, and tree sap.
ceramic_coating.step_2_body: • The hydrophobic properties of ceramic coating make water and dirt slide off easily, reducing buildup and making car cleaning simpler and faster.
ceramic_coating.step_3_body: • Ceramic coating enhances color intensity and creates a mirror-like effect, making your vehicle look brand new at all times.
ceramic_coating.step_4_body: • Although it does not provide full protection against deep scratches, ceramic coating reduces the risk of light scratches from daily use.
ceramic_coating.step_5_body: • With ceramic coating, your vehicle stays cleaner for longer and requires fewer chemicals during washing. In the long run, you save time and money on maintenance.

interior_care.details_1: The interior car care package is a comprehensive process of cleaning, maintaining, and refreshing your vehicle's interior. Its purpose is to restore cleanliness, hygiene, and aesthetics inside the car, making it comfortable and enjoyable for the driver and passengers.
interior_care.details_2: Below is a detailed description of the included procedures:
interior_care.ideal_list:
• Daily cars that need a refresh.
  • Professional vehicles that must be impeccable for clients.
  • Vehicles with children or pets, where hygiene is a priority. The interior car care package is the ultimate solution for a clean, well-maintained, and aesthetically pleasing interior, ready to provide you with a unique driving experience!
interior_care.step_1_body:
• Cleaning and disinfecting all hard surfaces, such as the dashboard, plastics, and doors.
  • Removing dust, fingerprints, and stains from every surface.
interior_care.step_2_body:
• Seat cleaning with specialized fabric or leather cleaners.
  • Hydration of leather surfaces to protect against cracks and wear.
interior_care.step_3_body:
• Vacuuming dust and debris.
  • Steam cleaning or using specialized products to remove stains and odors.
interior_care.step_4_body: • Cleaning the car's headliner fabric or material using gentle techniques that prevent damage.
interior_care.step_5_body: • Cleaning all interior glass surfaces for maximum visibility and shine.
interior_care.step_6_body: • Using special products or fragrances to eliminate unpleasant odors such as smoke or food smells.
interior_care.step_7_body: • Cleaning air vents, compartments, cup holders, and seams.

moto_care.details: The motorcycle care package is a specialized service designed for the complete maintenance and restoration of your motorcycle's appearance and functionality. It focuses on both cleaning and maintenance, ensuring that your motorcycle remains in excellent condition, looks impressive, and is protected from wear and tear.
moto_care.ideal_list:
• Daily riders who want to keep their motorcycle well-maintained.
  • Professional riders who pay attention to detail.
  • Motorcycles that need preparation for exhibitions or sales.
moto_care.step_1_body:
• Cleaning of all external parts with specialized products that remove dust, oil, and dirt without causing damage.
  • Special treatment for plastic and metal parts.
moto_care.step_2_body:
• Removal of dirt, brake dust, and grease from the wheels.
  • Cleaning and treatment of tires for a better look and protection against wear.
moto_care.step_3_body:
• Application of ceramic coating or wax to protect against scratches, fading, and weather conditions.
  • Enhancing the shine and vibrancy of colors.
moto_care.step_4_body:
• Careful cleaning of the engine and other mechanical components to remove grease and dirt.
  • Use of specialized cleaners that protect surfaces.
moto_care.step_5_body:
• Cleaning of headlights and mirrors for maximum visibility and safety.
  • Application of protective products against scratches and fading.
moto_care.step_6_body: • Care and hydration of leather seats or protection of fabric surfaces.
moto_care.step_7_body: • Cleaning of the windshield and other areas from insects and dirt for a clear and safe ride.
moto_care.step_8_header: Lubrication and Maintenance of Moving Parts
moto_care.step_8_body: • Lubrication of the chain, bearings, and other moving parts for optimal performance.

one_stage_polishing.details_1: The one-stage polishing exterior care package is designed to refresh your vehicle’s appearance by removing light scratches, oxidation, and dullness.
one_stage_polishing.details_2: Below is a detailed description of the included procedures:
one_stage_polishing.step_1_body:
• Pre-wash: Removal of dirt and dust from the surface using active foam (foam pre-wash).
  • Two-bucket wash: Use of the two-bucket method to prevent new scratches.
  • Wheel and tire cleaning: Application of specialized cleaners to remove stubborn stains and wear.
one_stage_polishing.step_2_body:
• Iron particle removal: Use of a specialized product to eliminate rust from the paint surface.
  • Clay bar treatment: Removal of stubborn contaminants such as resins and dirt residues.
one_stage_polishing.step_3_body:
• Product selection: Use of a special polishing compound that combines cutting and finishing action.
  • Machine polishing: Application with a polisher, focusing on light scratches and dull areas. The one-stage polishing significantly enhances the paint’s appearance, providing depth and shine.
one_stage_polishing.step_4_body:
• Wax or paint sealant: Application of a protective product that enhances shine and safeguards the surface from environmental factors such as UV radiation, rain, and pollution.
  • Glass finishing: Cleaning and protecting windows with a specialized product.
one_stage_polishing.step_5_body:
• Tires and plastic parts: Restoration of exterior plastics and tires for a uniform and fresh look.
  • Detail inspection: Surface check for any imperfections and final corrections.
